name: The importance of money
description:
This is a simple RPG

In order to marry the princess, the hero must defeat the last big devil.

But the power of the great devil is too strong.

So the protagonist needs to make money to buy equipment.

Equipment system

Equipment is divided into weapons, shields, head, clothing, accessories

If you have enough money, you can buy it

It can be equipped directly. There are no restrictions

Props system

Props are mainly therapeutic agents

If you have enough money, you can buy it.

Monster system

Monsters don't appear on the map. Walking on the road can lead to a fight

As long as you buy equipment, you can easily win

But if the equipment is too expensive, you can appreciate the importance of money
